Name: In a search of a new home
About the game: Are you ready to enjoy the adventure of the fox and help him find a home? The fox has lost his old home and he will have to go through many things with your help to test himself and to find a new place! 'In a search of a new home' is a very dynamic casual game, with beautiful graphics in colourfull style. Key features: Great music (8bit mario-style and others); Many different locations; obstacles; strong enemies; minimalistic level design; achievments; checkpoints (game saves) on every level; Jump, fight and run to be first in this game!
